project_overview: An NFT collection of unique avatars with front and back designs, featuring hidden anomalies in each card for added engagement.

steps.title: Set Up Directory Structure
steps.description: Organize files and directories for image storage, metadata, prompt templates, and main scripts.

details.notes: Images will be stored in 'images/', JSON metadata in 'metadata/', and scripts in 'scripts/'.

steps.title: Generate Prompt Templates
steps.description: Create a JSON file for storing prompt templates for different themes (Cyberpunk, Psychedelic, Vintage, Fantasy, etc.).

details.notes: Add more detailed attribute options for each theme. Aim for at least 5-10 attributes per theme.

steps.title: Generate Front Images
steps.description: Use AI (e.g., Stable Diffusion) to create the primary artwork for each avatar based on the prompts in 'prompts.json'.

details.notes: Each front image represents the main art style and personality of the avatar.

steps.title: Design Back Images (Backstory & Anomalies)
steps.description: Create a template in Illustrator or Photoshop for the back image, including space for backstory, attributes, and hidden anomalies.

details.backstory_format: Character name, backstory, attributes, hidden anomaly
details.notes: Ensure the anomaly is subtle and unique to each card, but follows the theme. E.g., for Cyberpunk, consider a small hidden QR code.

steps.title: Create JSON Metadata for Each Avatar
steps.description: For each avatar, create a JSON file with metadata linking to the front and back images, backstory, attributes, and anomaly information.

details.notes: Each JSON metadata file should capture the essential traits and any hidden anomaly information to give the collectors hints.

steps.title: Add Hidden Anomalies to Each Card
steps.description: Incorporate hidden elements in each avatar card to make it unique. Place the anomalies on either the front or back of the card.

anomaly_types: symbols (e.g., tiny logos or QR codes)
hidden text or symbols in backgrounds
details.manual_process: Anomalies can be manually added in Adobe Illustrator or Photoshop.
details.automated_process: Use a Python script to add random anomalies across batches, saving in the 'images/' directory.
details.notes: Make anomalies subtle enough to not disrupt the design, but visible on closer inspection.

steps.title: Quality Check and Final Adjustments
steps.description: Review all generated images and metadata to ensure consistency, quality, and alignment with the project's style and story.

checklist: Confirm front and back images are correctly paired.
Verify JSON metadata links to correct files.
Ensure anomalies are well-hidden but identifiable.
Test a few NFTs to ensure compatibility on platforms like OpenSea.
details.notes: Perform a thorough review to maintain the integrity and quality of the collection before minting.

steps.title: Mint and Deploy NFTs
steps.description: Mint each avatar card with front and back images as separate files (or as a composite, if preferred) and deploy to an NFT platform.

details.minting_process: Use JSON metadata and corresponding image files to mint each NFT with front/back view.
post-minting_tasks: Announce hidden anomalies to create excitement.
Promote collection on social media and community channels.
Engage with collectors by hosting discovery events or hints for anomalies.
details.notes: Consider incentivizing early collectors by revealing hidden Easter eggs gradually to build engagement.

overall_notes: This JSON structure serves as a roadmap to track each step in the creation of an NFT collection with front/back designs and hidden anomalies. Update the 'status' field as each step progresses, and keep track of any unique challenges or changes under 'notes'.
